originalText.text: window says closes at 7:00 and dude wouldn’t let me in at 6:45 to buy one thing. if you’re gonna close early post the right hours.

originalText.text: Worst service. The two gentleman in the front were acting like children telling the other one to “go help out, this is beyond my pay grade” left me standing there for ten minutes till a different woman came to help to me. I left without purchasing item because of the sheer child play.

originalText.text: Never had a problem here. Elaine is extremely helpful.

originalText.text: I’m a health care provider and I rarely ever like to leave bad reviews but I have to do so for this pharmacy. I tried calling for a patient to inquire about a delivery date for a raised toilet seat and a shower chair. I called them and the woman that picks up the phone immediately tells me no and hangs up the phone! I tried calling again and they just pick up and hang up. Unbelievable. This is for an elderly women and she needs these dme items. This is absurd. Rest assured I reported this pharmacy. Unbelievable.

originalText.text: I am so gladdened whenever I find a local traditional styled pharmacy in NYC! Walgreens begone, this place has everything you may need. The staff is friendly and helpful, I have yet to have a bad experience. I will say I only go there to pick up skin care/ bath products or low level heather care products. I have never picked up a prescription there, so I can't speak to that. But I highly recommend stopping by for your next purchase before heading across the street to CVS.
